Hi,

I have query regarding Unit Tests, I want to write unit tests for my Server application, but till now we haven't wrote any testing code, the application is ready and we are doing Smoke tests and regression tests. Anyone could suggest how I could apply unit test technique in the existing Server Application, what should be the approach for Unit tests.
Any help would be appreciable.

thanks,

Jims.
